name: Pit Jump Maze
description:
Pit Jump Maze

A puzzle maze game with an innovative pit jumping mechanic.

The rules are simple:

Don't fall into the pit!
Find 1) Jump 1 pit space
Find 2) Jump 2 pit spaces
Find 3) Jump 3 pit spaces

Use the mouse or arrow keys.

Pit Jump Maze is also available as a free web game with new puzzles daily:
PitJumpMaze.com
